marklogic.body:
Regardless of people's high emotions if evidence supports what Zimmerman claimed happened that night then he should NOT be arrested. I could care less what people are Shouting and demanding... all I want to hear is the true accounts of what happened. I need to see the facts and evidence lined up.
I'll tell you one thing, all this hullabaloo makes me cringe on who sits in a jury box these days. Emotions seem to have more leverage than Cold hard facts for most people... unreal.
